title: LIV Golfers, Paid Upfront, Giggle Their Way Around Trump Bedminster
description: Henrik Stenson won the third event on the LIV Golf tour, where nine-figure signing bonuses for top players guaranteed a carefree vibe.
dc:creator: Bill Pennington and Doug Mills
media:description: Brooks Koepka and his wife, Jena Sims, rode a golf cart just before the start of the LIV Golf event in Bedminster, N.J.
